forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
